amendment.description: To require the General Accounting Office to report to Congress on the immigrant investor program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1827 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1827 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S12476; text: CR S12476) To require the General Accounting Office to report to Congress on the immigrant investor program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1827 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Feingold.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1827 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
